name: OLD MAN. REMASTERED
description:
STORY:

You've been captured by Old Man, A man who loves human flesh. You need to find the tools that are scatered around the house, but be careful. Old Man is in the house too, so if he spots you, you must lock the door behind you and hide into one of the closets.

Can You Escape?

CONTROLS:

W A S D: to move.

Mouse: to look around

Left Mouse Button: to Interact.

Right Mouse Button to Lock Doors.

Shift: while moving to Run.

Ctrl: to Crouch.

C: to toggle Crouch.

Esc: pause menu.

This is a polygonal horror game and it's a remastered version of the original Old Man but way more scarier and harder! Also this is a parody/fangame of TUNKY by Dave Microwaves Games.
